text:
The 11-day Thaipoosam festival began with the flag hoisting at the Nagaraja Temple in Nagercoil on Saturday.

Sridharan Namboodhri hoisted the temple flag. Earlier, special pujas and abishekams were performed for the deity, which will be taken in a procession in the temple car on January 24, temple sources said.
title: Thaipoosam festival
